==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|鉤}}

===Etymology===
Variant of [[鉤]], via variation/corruption of phonetic [[句]] → [[勾]].

{{Han compound|金|t1=metal|勾|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a metal hook. 勾 also has meaning of “hook”, from its semantic [[勹]], hence a metal (金) hook (勾, 勹).
